migrate.change-storage-type: &4Please change your storage type to MYSQL or MARIADB & restart your server.
migrate.warning: &cAre you sure you want to migrate? This action is irreversible.
migrate.backup-hint1: &cMake sure you have made a backup of your decks.yml before continuing.
migrate.backup-hint2: &cYou can easily backup all settings using /cards debug zip
migrate.confirm-hint: &cIf you want to convert from YAML to

migrate-confirm.start-migration: &2Started migration for decks from YAML to %storage-type%
migrate-confirm.restart-hint: &cYou should restart your server, otherwise functionality of the plugin will be limited.
